entry.summary: [图灵设计了这机器, 图灵的理论不但没能启发任何计算机的设计, P 图灵设计的唯一一个计算机ACE, 所以图灵的理论启发了所有这些机器, 他把图灵的机器叫做]

entry.title: (No Title) 孔子4.html
entry.keywords: [heart, longer, right, 逾矩, set, boundaries, overstepped, afflicted, learning, thirty, desired, planted, heaven, docile, heard, biddings, firm, seventy, ear, ground, feet, dictates, knew, fifty, perplexities, suffered, follow, 不知, 从心所欲, men, 耳顺, knowing, 知天命, 不惑, know]
entry.summary: [At fifteen I set my heart upon learning. At thirty, I no longer suffered from perplexities. At fifty, I knew what were the biddings of Heaven. At sixty, I will be afflicted that I do not know men., I heard them with docile ear. At seventy]

entry.title: (No Title) 孔子5.html
entry.keywords: [man, men, wishes, 君子, superior, qualities, perfect, nearly, work, nature, 习相远, sharpen, 相近, opposite, mean, alike, tools, 敏于行, seeks, conduct, earnest, 成人之, 小人, slow, 成人之美, speech, bad, practice, admirable, craftsman, seek, wide, 必先利其器, apart, 工欲善其事]
entry.summary: [The superior man seeks to perfect the admirable qualities of men, The superior man wishes to be slow in his speech and earnest in his conduct. 君子成人之美, and does not seek to perfect their bad qualities.The mean man does the opposite of this. 性相近也, A craftsman who wishes to do his work well must first sharpen his tools. 君子欲讷于言, men are nearly alike]

entry.summary: [积分多少可以换某些东西, 对街头女人的某种走路姿势也越来越看不惯, 还有些玩积分的地方, 或者男人的生活方式已经比女人还精致了, 我曾试图在上海街头找一些机械加工的地方]
